title: Hindi Medium
summary: A young couple Raj (Irrfan Khan) & Mita (Saba Qamar) from Chandni Chowk, Delhi aspire to move into English speaking society for their daughterâ€™s sake. The film traces their trials and tribulations on this journey and the impact it has on their relationship on their family.

reviews.content: Heartwarming, engaging, thought-provoking, and humorous. This film won the Filmfare Award for Best Film, and it definitely deserved that award. Saba Qamar's performance is spectacular.
